name: Hypnocatrice Training
quest-details: Considering all the monsters you've hunted up to this point, this exercise should be nothing! Off you go!

name: Hypnocatrice Training
quest-details: Behold this invincible Hypnocatrice! So what should you do? Create a weak spot, of course! Aim for its legs and bring it down!

name: Hypnocatrice Training
quest-details: It's everybody's favorite: Hunting Horn Lessons! Give Purple-Purple-Red-Red-Yellow a bellow! And as always, use it twice!

name: Hypnocatrice Training
quest-details: You can't guard against Sleep Breath! Dodge when you have to and attack when you can. Being aware of your position is everything!

name: Hypnocatrice Training
quest-details: Hunting with a bow! The best way to reach out and nail a beast from a great distance! Just be wray of its kicks! Yeowch!

name: Emerald Congalala Training
quest-details: This armor is resistant to smells! You'll stay lemon-fresh no matter what! But it's not invincible, so good luck dodging!

name: Emerald Congalala Training
quest-details: Get the ol' Trap Master skill on I see! That ensures a 100% combination success rate! Materials? Still got to get those yourself!

name: Emerald Congalala Training
quest-details: It may be powerful, but so are you! This is going to be a match of strength! Go for its head and show it what you've got!

name: Emerald Congalala Training
quest-details: Usually, even if you guard, the smell lingers on. But no need to worry with this! Guard well and then counterattack away!

name: Emerald Congalala Training
quest-details: Attacking those things it lobs with its tail isn't going to get you very far. Dodge, then attack. One false step and ...

name: Plum D.Hermitaur Training
quest-details: Juggling bombs and a sword... Pretty hot stuff if you ask me. Better to stick to one or risk embarrassing yourself royally!

name: Plum D.Hermitaur Training
quest-details: Ha ha! Too much stuff can get in your way, so here, let me take some of it off your hands! Thanks.. Hey, what's that face for?

name: Plum D.Hermitaur Training
quest-details: Three Yellows make supersonic waves, so remem... huh? The usual? Purple-Purple-Green-Green-Yellow-Purple-Yellow, OK!?

name: Plum D.Hermitaur Training
quest-details: "Clash of the Titans, Part 2!" is what I'd say if going head-on wasn't going to get you squashed. Go get it from the side!

name: Plum D.Hermitaur Training
quest-details: When it's mad, stay the heck away, the farther the better, unless you want to be Breathed or Pressed to kingdom come!

name: Nargacuga Training
quest-details: You win Dual Blades fights by sticking close, so look for openings and stab away! Don't let those chances dance away from you!!

name: Nargacuga Training
quest-details: Your chance to deal serious damage lies in when it's charging up! Attack while it's still targeting! And use THAT thing!!

name: Nargacuga Training
quest-details: Your weapon this time is a nice one that can cause Paralysis! Use it to stop the monster and... You know the rest!

name: Nargacuga Training
quest-details: You're not going to be able to keep up with this bad body with a slow Gunlance. Best to lie in wait, if you know what I mean!

name: Nargacuga Training
quest-details: Striking and retreating a distance as a tactic isn't going to work against this one. Watch its movements well and react!

name: Copper Blangonga Training
quest-details: Don't get it mad or you're in for a world of pain! The trick here is to get the first strike! Aim true for its fangs!

name: Copper Blangonga Training
quest-details: I see you've got Art of Unsheathing activated on that armor! Dash in on your target and give it a mouthful of steel!

name: Copper Blangonga Training
quest-details: All that dashing back and forth sure can be harsh! But if you can focus and dish out a lot of small damage all at once...!

name: Copper Blangonga Training
quest-details: If you kill a Genprey and carve it up just right, you might get a Paralyze Throwing Knife! Use the knife well to stop your prey!

name: Copper Blangonga Training
quest-details: Low on defense, Gunners tend to get into big trouble at a single blow, but that's where you shine! Show me your will to survive!

name: Lavasioth Training
quest-details: Finally! It's time for your ever favorite Bomb Training! What? No Bombs? You do know how to use an Iron Pickaxe, right?

name: Lavasioth Training
quest-details: Sure it breathes molten rocks at you, but it's also got a huge weakness. Give its hollow legs a good whack for me, will ya?

name: Lavasioth Training
quest-details: That's a wineer's Horn you've got there! Purple-Red-Red for Attack Up, and Red-Blue-Red-Purple will boost your Health!

name: Lavasioth Training
quest-details: Even if your target's stronger than an ox, you'll be alright in your "Iron Curtain" armor! But... the rest is up to you!

name: Lavasioth Training
quest-details: Don't get caught between a rock and a hard place! One strike from this heavy-hitter and you're out! Head for wide areas! Evade!

name: Terra S.Ceanataur Training
quest-details: There's only one way to use Dual Blades: go for its legs and bring it down! The key to conquering danger is the will to fight!

name: Terra S.Ceanataur Training
quest-details: This weapon can crack even the hardest of hard crab shells. Now go stab one good in the back, and bring some home for supper!

name: Terra S.Ceanataur Training
quest-details: A fierce Horn from a fierce Carapaceon! Plus, play Purple-Purple-Red-Red-Green-Red to put some pep into your step!

name: Terra S.Ceanataur Training
quest-details: A test of endurance if I ever saw one. Let the raging waves hit your over and over, but keep an eye out for openings. Then strike!

name: Terra S.Ceanataur Training
quest-details: Those Water S you're carrying will freeze that crab's shell right over, causing enormous amounts of damage! Use them well!

name: Rajang Training
quest-details: Wow! You're definitely the cream of the crop! I am deeply impressed! I have nothing more to say. SHOW ME YOUR HUNTER'S PRIDE!

name: Rajang Training
quest-details: Wow! You're definitely the cream of the crop! I am deeply impressed! I have nothing more to say. SHOW ME YOUR HUNTER'S PRIDE!

name: Rajang Training
quest-details: Wow! You're definitely the cream of the crop! I am deeply impressed! I have nothing more to say. SHOW ME YOUR HUNTER'S PRIDE!

name: Rajang Training
quest-details: Wow! You're definitely the cream of the crop! I am deeply impressed! I have nothing more to say. SHOW ME YOUR HUNTER'S PRIDE!

name: Rajang Training
quest-details: Wow! You're definitely the cream of the crop! I am deeply impressed! I have nothing more to say. SHOW ME YOUR HUNTER'S PRIDE!
